node.title: Tag Football thriving in New Zealand despite disruptions thanks to COVID-19
node.description: More than 40,000 players are registered across the country.
node.content: ["Tag football, known in junior levels as Rippa Rugby, has just become a lot more professional.\u00a0", "The game has finally been recognised as an official sport in New Zealand, with more than 40,000 players across the country.\u00a0", "But just as officials were getting some momentum with the sports popularity - COVID-19 struck.\u00a0", "Watch the video above for the full story\u00a0"]
